subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/long version.....oh_me_and_the_boys_demon-evp.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : Went to a local Cemetery last Monday at 6pm. I went to the childrens section to ask if they get a chance to grow up> I noticed one area with only a rusted iron number rod inserted into the ground. As I knelt down to talk I saw from corner of left eye (and heard) a fist sized area on the ground Move and could hear sticks and leaves move from the circular area, no snakes, worms or mice could be seen.......I think-well this is ODD. But continue and ask my question. Here is my answer. This is one of
